Class PlantControllerCLI

java.lang.Object
com.landrycarroll.leaflog.plantmanagement.controllers.PlantControllerCLI
public class PlantControllerCLI extends Object
PlantControllerCLI provides a command-line interface (CLI) for interacting with plant-related features of the application. It delegates all business logic to PlantService and interacts with the user via a UserIO implementation (e.g., ConsoleIO).

This controller supports operations such as adding, editing, deleting, listing, and watering plants, as well as bulk importing plants from a file.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlantControllerCLI

      public PlantControllerCLI(UserIO io, PlantService plantService)
      Constructs a new PlantControllerCLI using the given UserIO and PlantService.
      Parameters:
      io - the I/O handler to interact with the user
      plantService - the service handling business logic for plants

  • Method Details

    • addPlant

      public void addPlant()
      Prompts the user for plant details and creates a new plant. Outputs success or error messages based on the outcome.

    • addPlantsFromFile

      public void addPlantsFromFile()
      Prompts the user for a file path and attempts to import plant records from that file. Each valid line results in a new plant being created and printed to the screen.

    • deletePlant

      public void deletePlant()
      Prompts the user for a plant ID and deletes the corresponding plant. Prints a success or failure message.

    • editPlant

      public void editPlant()
      Prompts the user for updated plant details and updates the corresponding plant record.

    • viewPlantList

      public void viewPlantList()
      Retrieves and prints the full list of plants.

    • waterPlant

      public void waterPlant()
      Prompts the user for a plant ID and marks that plant as watered.
